job_tasks.phrase: Work closely with clients to help implement, review or remediate their machine learning strategies.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase indicates direct engagement with clients to understand their business needs and align AI/ML strategies accordingly.

job_tasks.phrase: Understanding of the mathematical foundations of ML algorithms.
job_tasks.justification: This directly relates to the theoretical underpinnings of building and adapting machine learning models.

job_tasks.phrase: Experience in building and maintaining RESTFul ML model APIs
job_tasks.justification: This describes the core software engineering task of creating and managing interfaces for ML models.
This explicitly mentions knowledge of MLOps, which falls under operations engineering for AI/ML systems.

soft_skills.phrase: Work with junior developers in the field of AI and ML engineering on your team through technical issues.
Guide and support the improvement of data skills for the junior developers in your team.
Work closely with clients to help implement, review or remediate their machine learning strategies.
act as a hands on, Engineer working across a Club's portfolio of clients, onsite and in multi-skilled agile delivery teams.

classification.rationale: The role emphasizes understanding ML algorithms, using a variety of ML toolkits and libraries (PyTorch, Scikit-Learn), and building ML APIs. While there's client interaction (Business Understanding), the core focus is on the engineering and operational aspects of machine learning models rather than generative AI specific tasks.
